entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Ronge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
